## EventMessageFromClient type

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The set of known messages from the watch loop to the host.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type EventMessageFromClient = IRequestRunEventMessage | IAfterExecuteEventMessage | ISyncEventMessage;
```
**References:** [IRequestRunEventMessage](./operation-graph.irequestruneventmessage.md)<></>, [IAfterExecuteEventMessage](./operation-graph.iafterexecuteeventmessage.md)<></>, [ISyncEventMessage](./operation-graph.isynceventmessage.md)
